title: Amy’s Kids Got Another Stimulus Check + Joe Nichols Performs His Big Hits In Studio! + Eddie Wants To Ban A Song
itunes:title: Amy’s Kids Got Another Stimulus Check + Joe Nichols Performs His Big Hits In Studio! + Eddie Wants To Ban A Song
description:
Amy shares an update that now her daughter has received a stimulus check. She wonders now if it’s really legit or should she give the money back? Joe Nichols stops by to talk new music, a record he holds at the Opry and performs a few of his big hits from back in the day. Eddie talks about a song that he wants to ban his kids from singing at the house. Bobby loves to take baths at hotels but was upset after reading a news story on why you shouldn’t.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
